comments.text: The frecency calculation currently treats AppTabs just like every other URL - but they're not. These are URLs that are used a lot, but they're also always loaded, always visible, and always accessible. So at the moment, they can end up dominating the frecency results.
comments.raw_text: The frecency calculation currently treats AppTabs just like every other URL - but they're not. These are URLs that are used a lot, but they're also always loaded, always visible, and always accessible. So at the moment, they can end up dominating the frecency results.
comments.author: blair@theunfocused.net
comments.creator: blair@theunfocused.net

comments.text: App Tabs are preserved across sessions. So after typing the URL once you hardly need to type it ever again. Without typing and re-opening frequency is not affected.
comments.raw_text: App Tabs are preserved across sessions. So after typing the URL once you hardly need to type it ever again. Without typing and re-opening frequency is not affected.
